comments:

thin, 1/10 of a line height.

apologies for delay.
The NPE from intro should be fixed in builds >= 20040416 

retruning to UI team to fix wizard bug.
Are you using the Gnome or the KDE desktop?
Could you attach a screenshot please? I cannot replicate this in M8

I have just tried this on Suse 9 in Gnome, KDE and the default and could not 
replicate

Created an attachment (id=9880)
Screenshot of the wizard with the widget of the description 

here is the screenshot of the bug in action :)

I'm have gtk2-2.2.3 and kdebase3-3.1.4-48

I was able to reproduce this particular bug. However, the "New Project" wizard 
has now changed (post M8) and does not include the description pane (see 
attached pictures). The other scenario where I could see this being a problem 
is for the activities dialog ("Window->Configure Activities"). I have verified 
it on Linux and this problem does not happen for the described instance.

Created an attachment (id=10029)
"New Project" wizard for M8

The M8 "New Project" dialog includes a description pane.

Created an attachment (id=10030)
"New Project" wizard for post M8

The "New Project" wizard after M8 does not include the description pane.

Marking invalid since the "New Project" wizard does not include a description 
pane anymore.
Please re-open if any problems of this nature arise.
